title: Denmark lauds constructive talks with U.S. over Greenland: ‘Now we are back on track’
summary_full: It comes shortly after Trump announced a framework deal regarding the Arctic island and backed away from imposing tariffs on several European countries.
summary_public: It comes shortly after Trump announced a framework deal regarding the Arctic island and backed away from imposing tariffs on several European countries.

DK.label: positive
DK.evidence: Denmark lauds constructive talks with U.S. over Greenland
